title: Simple Steps to Add a Screen Name to AOL

steps.title: Go to the screen names page:
steps.content: Go to the screen names page: https://my.screenname.aol.com .

steps.title: Log into your account using your main screen name and password on the given boxes.
steps.content: Log into your account using your main screen name and password on the given boxes.

steps.title: Enter the answer to your security question in the Answer field.
steps.content: Enter the answer to your security question in the Answer field.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions, and enter your password.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions, and enter your password.

steps.title: Choose "Parental Control" settings.
steps.content: Choose "Parental Control" settings. You can select whether the account is for mature, young teens, even kids only.
